DOC.brief_summary: The goal project conduct pilot study evaluate feasibility , acceptability , estimate effect size new computerized Motivational Enhancement Therapy ( cMET ) intervention alcohol-involved adolescent primary care patient .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Test Computerized MET Reduce Adolescent Alcohol Use
DOC.detailed_description: The goal project conduct pilot study evaluate feasibility , acceptability , estimate effect size new computerized Motivational Enhancement Therapy ( cMET ) intervention alcohol-involved adolescent primary care patient . The investigator hypothesize 1 ) cMET , add Computerized Alcohol Screening Brief Intervention ( cASBI ) , ( cASBI+cMET ) feasible acceptable use primary care ; 2 ) 12- 18-yr old patient receive cASBI+cMET low rate alcohol use , day alcohol use , drink per drinking day , day heavy episodic drinking , cASBI alone .
DOC.criteria: alcohol use day past 90 day email address internet access home , school , library unable read understand English live away college time recruitment visit available computer/telephone followup judge provider medically emotionally unstable time visit
